SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main class for the maze game application.
Direction
The Direction enum represents the four directions North South East and West that are used to define the sides of a room.
Door
Abstract product The Door class represents a door in the maze to connects two rooms.
DoorNeedingSpell
Concrete product class, represents a door in the maze that requires a spell to open, extending the Abstract product Door class
EnchantedMazeFactory
Concrete factory: An enchanted maze factory that creates magical components for the maze, such as EnchantedRooms and DoorsNeedingSpells.
EnchantedRoom
Abstract product: Represents an enchanted room in the maze.
MapSite
An abstract class that represents a component of the maze.
Maze
Represents the maze, containing all the rooms.
MazeFactory
Abstract factory: Factory class for creating new maze components: Maze, Room, Wall, and Door.
MazeGame
The MazeGame class is creates and initializes the mazes with rooms, doors, and walls with a template.
Room
Abstract product class Represents a room in the maze.
Spell
Represents a spell, which can be associated with enchanted rooms or doors requiring spells to open.
Wall
Represents a wall in the maze.
